name: 100% Virgin Indian High Premium Hair
description:
Butterfly Dolls offers 100% Virgin Indian Hair in all lengths in wavy or curly. 

Also the hair is on a strong weft, minimum shedding, dye it any color, flat iron bone straight, and lasts up to 12 months or more. 
Why pay for beauty supply hair that will only last for a couple months and spend a couple hundred dollars.
Invest in hair that will last and stay beautiful and save you money in the long run.

Contact me by email or check my facebook page Butterfly Dolls for more information!!!!!
